location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Stephen Babington, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter relates to the visit of Mirza Sadiq and Mahomed Sadiq to the Court of Hyderabad. William Bruce acknowledges instructions from the Supreme Government to discourage as much as possible any future visits made by Persians to Hyderabad.
